resources.string: Tor provides additional protections for your IP address. This feature uses Tor network to fetch exchange rates, send transactions, retrieve transaction data, and connect to third party APIs (e.g. NEAR coming soon).\n\nAs a beta feature, it may affect performance. If Tor is permitted in your region, we recommend enabling it.
Fetch exchange rates from third-party servers without revealing your IP address. (Only available with Tor enabled.)
Send and retrieve transaction data over Tor for added privacy.
Access third-party APIs (e.g. NEAR) over Tor for added privacy.
